title: Trump Firm to Start New Cryptocurrency for Shareholders
description: Trump Media and Technology Group Corp. plans to issue a new cryptocurrency, which will be distributed among its shareholders.
content: Trump Media and Technology Group Corp. plans to issue a new cryptocurrency, which will be distributed among its shareholders.
